mapper.insert: insert into MVA_TX_INTELLIGENT_ASR (PID, LOG_ID, LEAV_WORD_TIME, ANI, LEAVEWORD_PATH, VOICE_FILE_NAME, CALLID, FULL_PATH) select sys_guid(), LOG_ID, LEAV_WORD_TIME, ANI, LEAVEWORD_PATH, VOICE_FILE_NAME, CALLID, FULL_PATH from IVR_JT_LEAVWORD@HUAWEI_ICD_DB_LINK ivr where not exists (select callid from MVA_TX_INTELLIGENT_ASR asr where ivr.CALLID = asr.callid)
mapper.select: SELECT PID , LOG_ID , LEAV_WORD_TIME , ANI , LEAVEWORD_PATH , VOICE_FILE_NAME , CALLID , FULL_PATH , TXFILEFLAG , ASRFLAG , TASKID , TX_RESULT , INSERT_TIME , TXPARSE_STATUS , ISSUBMIT FROM ICC_UNION.MVA_TX_INTELLIGENT_ASR WHERE ROWNUM <= #{top} AND TXFILEFLAG IS NULL AND LEAVEWORD_PATH IS NOT NULL AND VOICE_FILE_NAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY to_date (LEAV_WORD_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
